nodes.text: Gueal was a sentient species with red-colored eyes, slit pupils and long snouts.

The Gueal was featured in a segment called "The Gueal's Lament" in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
